section.title: Build all packages
section.para:
After setting everything up properly as described in , &kx; can now be bootstrapped:
&kx_as_root; MNT=/mnt/kxmnt
cd ${MNT}/home/kaarpux/kaarpux bootstrap/host_scripts/complete_bootstrap.sh
Progress (or error) messages will be shown on the terminal, and also piped to build.log
